The lover of the parfumeria doubled the shop of the Great Lukas.Today is 8:00.0
In December 2023, a young man went to a shop on Lenin's Prospect and took the DG spirits from there. The damage was over 3,000 roubles.

In January, the giant visited the store again. But now he's taken two spirit flasks for 6,000.rubles diagrams
Synoptics told me what the weather is. Pskov Region 30 JanuaryToday is 7:00.0
On 30 January, cloud weather is expected in the Pskov region. A little snow at night. Days in most areas are small rainfall in the form of wet snow and rain. There's a holodeck on the roads.

Wind of the southern directions between 5 and 10 m/sec.

TemperatureGreat Lukas
The Great Lukas, two thieves from the second attempt to steal the businessToday is 18:00.0
The great Lukas will be tried by a 35-year-old and 53-year-old local population who decided to " retrieve the property of the enterprise. But they didn't steal the metal from the first one.times
About 100 tons of humanitarian cargo were received by Pskov military personnel in the PSS areaIt's 17:30.0
The Pskov region continues to support military personnel in the special military operation zone. Unsatisfactory residents collected and sent another large shipment of necessary items, some 100 tons of humanitarian cargo.

These are construction and sawn materials, tools,generators
The units from the Great Lakes region saved the life of a pensioner who became ill at home.Today is 5:00.0
In the Greater Town Region, the parishes provided prenatal care to a 81-year-old woman, thus saving her life. This has been reported to the Regional Office of Internal Affairs press service.

On 26 January, in the early morning, a resident of the village of Kislovo, who told her that her 81-year-old neighbour was knocking into the wall and♪
The great Lukas will forgive the schoolgirl who died in the explosion of the heating system.It's 16:30.0
On 27 January, the girl ' s father worked independently to develop the home heating system. Owing to injuries caused by the severe germination of a heating element, the schoolgirl died at the scene.

" For many years, we have known her as a smart, talented girl, athlete, responsivehuman Circumstances
Rock: The Greaterbelenian hit the bottle once and he died.Today is 4:00.0
In the city of the Great Luka, a man will be tried on charges of having a known death by negligence. This was reported in the Russian SKS on Pskov Region.

Investigators completed criminal investigationcases
The Great Kickboxer won all Russian competitions in Sosdal.It's 15:30.0
Sportsman of the Unity Club VisionH.E. ŠedikoHe won all the Russian kikboxing competitions The Golden Ring that took place the previous day in Sosdal.

The status of the child, whose parents and brother died in the Glouc region, became knownToday is 14:48.04 photos
Luki.ru had previously been told that on 27 January, a car called " WAZ 2107 " under the control of a resident of the Tawer region of 1998 and a bus called " PAZ " , which had been driven by a 49-year-old giant, was hit.

Driver of the passenger car as well as hisPassengers .
It became known that it would be with the “buying house” on Lieutenant Schmidt's coast in the Great Lukas.Today is 14:30.0
The great Lucky is a city with a rich history that is not only stored on the pages of the books of the Kraves and the hearts of people, which is important and interesting where they live. An integral part of any history is architecture. There were about 60 pre-revolutions in the city in Lowati.building diagrams

info.title: The lover of the parfumeria doubled the shop of the Great Lukas.
info.short_text:
In December 2023, a young man went to a shop on Lenin's Prospect and took the DG spirits from there. The damage was over 3,000 roubles.

In January, the giant visited the store again. Only now he's taken two spirit flasks on 6,000 roubles.

info.title: Synoptics described the weather of the Pskov region on 30 January
info.short_text:
On 30 January, cloud weather is expected in the Pskov region. A little snow at night. Days in most areas are small rainfall in the form of wet snow and rain. There's a holodeck on the roads.

Wind of the southern directions between 5 and 10 m/sec.

Temperature in the Great Lukas

info.title: The Great Lukas, two thieves from the second attempt to steal the business
info.short_text: The great Lukas will be tried by a 35-year-old and 53-year-old local population who decided to " retrieve the property of the enterprise. But they didn't steal the metal at the first time.

info.title: About 100 tons of humanitarian cargo were received by Pskov military personnel in the PSS area

The Pskov region continues to support military personnel in the special military operation zone. Unsatisfactory residents collected and sent another large shipment of necessary items, some 100 tons of humanitarian cargo.

They're building and lumber, tools, numerators.

info.title: The units from the Great Lakes region saved the life of a pensioner who became ill at home.
info.short_text:
In the Greater Town Region, the parishes provided prenatal care to a 81-year-old woman, thus saving her life. This has been reported to the Regional Office of Internal Affairs press service.

On 26 January, in the early morning, a resident of the village of Kislovo was reported to the duty station of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia, who said that her 81-year-old neighbour was knocking into the wall and was worth a row.

info.title: The Great Kickboxer won all Russian competitions in Sosdal.
info.short_text:
Hisr Shedico, a sportsman of the Vitas Club of Unification, defeated all Russian competitions in the Kikboxing of the Golden Ring that took place the previous day in Souzdal.

According to the Coach Kickboxer Sergei Moscal on the Web site, the young genomeran has completed the nucleus.

Passenger car driver and passengers .
